name: .DHV
summary: Learn about .DHV files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open DHV files with various applications, including software included with the Husqvarna sewing machine, BALARAD Embird Studio (Windows), and PREMIER+ Embroidery (multiplatform). You can also convert DHV files with PREMIER+ Embroidery to other embroidery and image formats, such as .PES, .JEF, .JPG, and .PNG.
